      Add the new employee to the target [STEP 2:] If target is not vacant, add new employee to the target's team [STEP 3:] If target is vacant, fill the position with the initials of new employee [COMPLETION:] If the newPerson has a role but no initials, change the role of the target.

    • Method Detail

      • addNewPerson

        public void addNewPerson(Employee newEmpl,
                         Employee target)
        Add the new employee to the target [STEP 2:] If target is not vacant, add new employee to the target's team [STEP 3:] If target is vacant, fill the position with the initials of new employee [COMPLETION:] If the newPerson has a role but no initials, change the role of the target.

      • callOrganiseTree

        public void callOrganiseTree()

      • doMouse

        public void doMouse(java.lang.String action,
                    double x,
                    double y)
        Most of the work is initiated by the mouse. The action depends on where the mouse is pressed: on an employee in the tree, or the new person and where it is released: on another employee in the tree, on the retirement Icon, or empty space An existing person will be moved around in the tree, retired, or repositioned. The new person will be added into the tree;

      • loadHelper

        public void loadHelper(java.util.Scanner scan,
                       Employee e,
                       double children)
        Aids the loadSave funtion by recusivly calling itslef to find more employees in the team

      • loadSave

        public void loadSave()
        Loads a previously saved file and prints it out

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] arguments)

      • organiseRecurse

        public int organiseRecurse(Employee e)

      • organiseTree

        public void organiseTree(Employee e)
        Sets up the organisation for the tree

      • retirePerson

        public void retirePerson(Employee empl)
        STEP 3 Retire an employee. If they are a manager or the CEO, then make the position vacant (leaving the employee object in the tree, but no initials) If they are not a manager, then remove them from the tree completely.

      • saveTree

        public void saveTree()
        Saves the tree to a file specfied by the user

      • saveTreeHelper

        public void saveTreeHelper(Employee e,
                           java.io.PrintStream out)
        Recursivly finds the employees to add to the file which is being saved.

      • setupGUI

        public void setupGUI()
        Set up the GUI (buttons and mouse)
